# About

`{backyard}` is a shiny based back-end that provides a UI for easier collaboration on Bookdown projects.

The goal of `{backyard}` is to provide an easy to use interface, whether you are an R/Rmarkdown user or not.

## Installation

You can install the dev version of backyard with:

```{r eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("ColinFay/backyard")

```

## Disclaimer

`{backyard}` is still at an experimental level and should be considered as such. Use cautiously.
